tutorialPages.messageText: NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "AF116CBA4E5C7DC6B9566292AF94EEBA", "Caravans are an important part of moving large amounts of materials from one node to another. You can purchase a basic caravan from the Caravan Master.")

NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "FCC5066644C1271280F863BCA6F18797", "Caravans can be upgraded with components that can be purchased or crafted. Components increase stats and allow specializations, but need to be repaired or replaced with use.")

NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "344FB6DB45A8B3FF45600DAA1A65DB9E", "When your caravan is packed and ready to launch you will be given an item to call your caravan. This item will allow you to summon your caravan to the node outskirts when you\'re ready to depart.")
